• Sr Data Science Supervisor Locations Bengaluru, Karnataka, India (Hybrid) Posting Date08/20/2025 Trending Honeywell is looking for a strategic and technically skilled Sr Data Science Supervisor to join our Commercial Data & Analytics (CoDA) team.
• This hybrid role blends leadership and hands-on execution—perfect for experienced data scientists who want to shape strategy, drive innovation, and deliver impactful solutions without direct people management responsibilities.
• Information Systems, IT, Cyber Engineer & Data Science - Summer 2026 Intern Locations United States Posting Date08/29/2025 Trending Through hands-on learning experiences, global exposure, networking, and professional development opportunities, Honeywell interns will shape the future.
• You’ll have the opportunity to work alongside industry experts, lead initiatives that refine technical skills, and have unparalleled mentorship and growth opportunities that will elevate your career.
